gcci.text: With H100 rental rates around $3.13/hr, supply remains tight while new capacity is delayed, forcing hyperscalers to lock in long‑term leases and spend billions on capex to secure chips, which could temporarily soften spot prices but keeps utilization high.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek’s API pricing near $1.28 per 1M input tokens is pressuring margins across providers, accelerating model compression and KV‑cache reuse as vendors race to cut cost per token while differentiating on quality.

gagl.text: AI’s 120 TWh annual load is stressing grids and raising carbon intensity unless firms pair compute with low‑carbon power, nuclear SMRs, and better PUE, while time‑of‑use scheduling helps avoid peak costs.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment is buoyant but tempered by energy constraints and capex scrutiny, signaling a healthy growth runway if power and efficiency stay on pace and prices normalize without a bubble.
